meanings.sent1: The unsexing potion made the cat look neither male nor female.
meanings.sent2: The unsexing process stripped away any signs of gender from the robot.
meanings.sent3: The unsexing spell turned the colorful parrot into a genderless creature.
meanings.sent4: Her unsexing haircut left her with a bold, androgynous look.
meanings.sent5: The unsexing transformation in the movie was both eerie and fascinating.

meanings.definition: Removing the qualities or attributes of being male or female.
meanings.sent1: The unsexing experiment resulted in a completely neutral appearance.
meanings.sent2: The unsexing treatment erased any trace of gender from the plant.
meanings.sent3: The unsexing makeover gave the dog a mysterious and unique appearance.
meanings.sent4: The unsexing effect of the costume made the actor look otherworldly.
meanings.sent5: The unsexing process in the story symbolized a loss of identity.
